name: Tamer legends Galaxy Adventure
description:
▼ INTRODUCTION:

Have you ever dreamed of conquering the universe? Have you ever imagined what aliens look like? Have you ever wondered why aliens still don't appear. Surely your childhood also dreamed of driving spaceships. Wandering in the galaxies ranges discovering unknown planets. So why wait any longer without downloading "Tamer Legends - Galaxy Aventure RPG" right now.

▼ HOW TO PLAY:

+ Clicking on the enemy to attack and click on the gap on the ground to move.
+ Pet will follow, fight and protect you
+ Your mission is to conquer the entire planet
+ During your battle, the enemy can drop their pieces of DNA when they die. Pick it up.
+ When you have enough pieces of DNA, summon that Pet. And it will be yours
+ Collect lots of resources and materials to upgrade heroes and evolve Pet to a new form that increases strength
+ Evolution Pet helps Pet to unlock their skills and intrinsic

▼ FUNCTION:

▶ SUPER WIDE MAP, FREE DISCOVERY
You will be overwhelmed when entering the game. The map is really vast compared to what you're imagining now. Even so, the game's capacity is extremely small. Isn't it amazing? . The map is so big, you will think it's boring. No, there are thousands of things for you to explore. From things on the ground like animals, trees and strange vegetation. Go to caves that contain extremely dangerous and powerful bosses.When conquering them, you will receive great rewards

▶ TACTICAL GAMEPLAY
Not just pure RPG lines. The gameplay of "Tamer Legends-Galaxy Aventure RPG " is also tactical. It is a display of your pet squad. By bringing the proper pets, you will be Buff squad. And other pets have attributes of that system. The system will counter each other. So, collect as many pets as you could. Then pick out the most powerful ones and build a strong squad. You will win all the most powerful opponents.

▶ THE PET SYSTEM IS EXTREMELY DIVERSE
Pet factions of the game "Tamer Legends - Galaxy Aventure RPG" is very diverse. There are 6 factions: Water, Fire, Forest, Stone, Light and Dark. Each faction has its own characteristics and is overcome by another factions. In addition, they can evolve into different forms. Depends on the player.

▶ SUMMON PET, CREATING THE FORMATION IN THE DREAM
During the battle, the enemy can drop their pieces of DNA when they die. Pick them up. When collecting enough pieces of DNA needed. Please summon that Pet. And it will be yours. Creating a squad helps increase the team's combat force. In addition, a suitable squad will help you win the most powerful monsters.

▶ EVOLUTION OF PET TO MAXIMUM
Pet comes to a certain level. They will evolve into a new shape. Evolution helps Pet gain strength, unlock skills and intrinsic. A Pet will have 3 levels of evolution.

▶ EPIC WAR
When the battle begins, you will not only fight a monster. You will fight with a mob. This is really a crazy battle. Where you show all your skills. Fight, create a beautiful combo chain. Activate all Hero and Pet skills. Form an extremely fierce battle.

▶ STUNNING DESIGN, EFFECT & GRAPHICS
Graphics effects and vivid sound will make you overwhelmed. You will completely immerse yourself in the game. Move from planet to planet. Not only that, the slow rotation effect will make the skills to be released extremely class.

▶ UPGRADING SKILLS
In order to be able to defeat the fierce monsters. You need to upgrade the skills and power of both Hero and Pet. Hero and pet have many stats such as Power battle force, ATK attack index, DEF defense index, SPEED attack speed ATK and critical rate CRIT ... Upgrade all those indicators Strongest possible. Upgrading will consume resources. Pick up as many resources as possible. You will win every battle.
